casebody.data:
Mondon v. The Western Union Telegraph Company. No reason appears to take this case out of the general rule that this court will not interfere with the discretion of the trial court in granting a first new trial. March 26, 1894.

Argued at the last term.

Action for damages. Before Judge Turnbull. City court of Floyd county. December term, 1892. McHenry, Nunnally & Neel, for plaintiff Bigby, Heed, Berry & Foote and Wrights & Harper, contra.

Judgment affirmed.
